description: This file defines classes and functions for managing project templates, including template registration, project initialization, and file copying with variable replacements. It includes classes for different project templates, a factory for creating templates, and a main function demonstrating project setup.

classes.name: ProcessingStep
classes.description: Enum for processing steps (Pre-processing and Post-processing).

classes.name: ProjectTemplate
classes.description: Abstract base class for project templates, providing common initialization, processing, and structure generation methods.

classes.name: ProjectTemplateFactory
classes.description: Factory class for creating project template instances based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class orchestrating project initialization and template registration.

classes.name: FileSystemHelper
classes.description: Helper class providing static methods for copying files and directories with variable replacements.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Performs project initialization steps including validation, structure generation, and testing setup.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for post-processing to complete with a timeout.

methods.name: _run_processing_script
methods.description: Runs a processing script in the background or synchronously.

methods.name: register_template
methods.description: Registers a new template class for a specific project type.

methods.name: create_template
methods.description: Creates a project template instance based on project configuration.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Creates and initializes a project based on provided configuration.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Loads project configuration from a JSON file.
